title: 3 and Out - Draft Predictions; Darnold/Joe Brady Marriage; Deshaun Watson Issues; Edelman Respect; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Draft Predictions; Darnold/Joe Brady Marriage; Deshaun Watson Issues; Edelman Respect; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why he has questions about Zach Wilson to the Jets, why he's not buying Mac Jones to the Niners, and some other Draft predictions with two weeks out. He also looks at how Panthers OC Joe Brady and Sam Darnold can change each others NFL fortunes. why things look worse and worse for Deshaun Watson as more information comes out, and the pros and cons of the Rams skipping college pro days, He also gives his thoughts on Julian Edelman retiring, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
